Package se.nicklasgavelin.bluetooth

Interface Summary
BluetoothDiscoveryListener Used with the "Bluetooth" class to listen for updates regarding the device search that may be performed.
 

Class Summary
Bluetooth Gives the possibility to find and connect to remote Bluetooth devices.
Bluetooth.EVENT Describes an error for the Bluetooth
BluetoothConnection This originated from the Mobile Processing project - http://mobile.processing.org Ported to Processing by extrapixel, http://www.extrapixel.ch/bluetooth/ This library is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU Lesser General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2.1 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.
BluetoothDevice Manages a single bluetooth device Masks the "RemoteDevice" class as extra methods are implemented to make it easier to communicate with the given device
BluetoothService This originated from the Mobile Processing project - http://mobile.processing.org Ported to Processing by, http://www.extrapixel.ch/bluetooth/ This library is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU Lesser General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2.1 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.
 

Enum Summary
Bluetooth.EVENT.EVENT_CODE The code for each of the possible events
